sentences.en: All species of worms in a habitat are considered.
sentences.cn: 所有蚯蚓在栖息地达到相当数量.

sentences.en: Dry stone walls may appear stark and lifeless, but they provide a valuable habitat for plants and animals.
sentences.cn: 干燥的石墙看起来也许荒凉且毫无生机，但它们为动植物提供了宝贵的栖息地。

sentences.en: Ecodeme refers to a deme occuring within a specified kind of habitat.
sentences.cn: 生态同群种是指出现于某种特殊生境内的同群种.

sentences.en: In its natural habitat, the hibiscus will grow up to 25ft.
sentences.cn: 在原生境中，木槿能长到25英尺高。

sentences.en: Man would have to assist in the maintenance of species populations by habitat manipulation.
sentences.cn: 人类仍将通过居住地管理来帮助保持种群体.

sentences.en: Many species are in peril of extinction because of our destruction of their natural habitat.
sentences.cn: 许多物种由于我们破坏了它们的自然环境,现在正面临灭绝的危险.

sentences.en: Monkeys live in an arboreal habitat.
sentences.cn: 猴子生活在树上的栖息地.

sentences.en: Multiple distress signals, both from the colony and from an orbital habitat.
sentences.cn: 成倍的求救信号, 有来自殖民地的,有来自栖息轨道的.

sentences.en: One of the most important causes of extinction is loss of habitat.
sentences.cn: 灭绝的最重要原因之一就是生活环境的丢失.

sentences.en: The grassland is an important habitat for many wild flowers.
sentences.cn: 这片草原是很多野花的重要生长地。

sentences.en: The moth's habitat is being destroyed and it has nearly died out.
sentences.cn: 这种蛾子因栖息地正受到破坏,几乎绝种了.

sentences.en: The panda's natural habitat is the bamboo forest.
sentences.cn: 大熊猫的天然栖息地是竹林。

sentences.en: The photosynthetic responses determine the habitat of P . rubens and P . Mariana in the climax forest.
sentences.cn: 光合反应决定红云杉和黑云杉在顶极林中的生态环境.

sentences.en: The polar region is the habitat of the polar bear.
sentences.cn: 北极地带为北极熊的栖息地.

sentences.en: These include character displacement, habitat selection.
sentences.cn: 这些包括特征置换 、 栖息地的选择.

sentences.en: This creature's natural habitat is the jungle.
sentences.cn: 这种动物的栖息地是丛林.

sentences.en: watching monkeys in their natural habitat
sentences.cn: 观察自然生活环境中的猴子

trans.tran_en: the natural home of a plant or animal
